text: Kya tum logon ne hajiyon ko pani peelaney aur masjid e haraam (khane kaaba) ki mujawari karne ko us shaks ke kaam ke barabar thehra liya hai jo iman laya Allah par aur roz e aakhir par aur jisne jaanfishani (exerted his utmost) ki Allah ki raah mein? Allah ke nazdeek to yeh dono barabar nahin hain aur Allah zalimon ki rehnumayi nahin karta
